name: Tweezerman Stainless Steel Slant Tweezer - Eyebrow Tweezers for Women and Men (Midnight Strike)
short_description: AWARD WINNING: Allure 'Best of Beauty' winner every year since 2001. Professional quality, 25-degree slanted tip is the perfect angle for working against the brow bone. Perfectly aligned, hand-filed tips close evenly and firmly to remove hair from the root.
PREP YOUR BROWS: Start by opening pores using a warm washcloth (not too hot or it can cause redness) This will help get your hair ready for removal, and it will also reduce pain.

HOW TO USE: After locating the unwanted hair, grab the tweezer tips slanted at a 25-degree angle and squeeze down on the body of the tweezer, pulling in the direction of hair growth. Continue until you have removed all unwanted hair.

QUALITY DESIGN: A staple to your beauty routine and famous for its precision, the Slant Tweezer features perfectly aligned, hand-filed tips that grab every hair, every time. Superior calibrated tension for comfort, control, and true precision.
TOOL CARE: Clean tweezer tips after each use with an alcohol wipe. Tweezer cannot be cleaned in an autoclave. This product is not tested on animals.
